description: A particular CIDR (e.g. `"192.168.1.1/24"`,`"2001:db9::/64"`) that is allowed for the Pods matched by a NetworkPolicySpec's `podSelector`. The `except` entry describes CIDRs that should not be included within this rule.

cidr.description: A string representing the IP Block. Valid examples are `"192.168.1.1/24"` or `"2001:db9::/64"`.

except.description: A list of CIDRs that should not be included within an IP Block. Valid examples are `"192.168.1.1/24"` or `"2001:db9::/64"`. `except` values will be rejected if they are outside the `cidr` range.
